text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews Thanks for having this speech on Saturday so no one will watch your wide orange load breathing heavily, reading slow making your speech more boring 🥱 than ever😴 BUNKER BOY, I can’t wait until your MAGA losers start dropping like flies from COVID-19 after your rally, so sad NOT!
